subject: A young woman in a bright red hooded cloak, shown in full body
action: Crouching and staring intensely at the viewer, entire body visible
setting: Dark, undefined background with encircling chains, ensuring the full body is framed

style.artistic_style: Ultra-realistic photography with dark fantasy elements
style.rendering_technique: High-resolution digital photography with minimal post-processing to preserve extreme realism

lighting.type: Precise and detailed lighting, highlighting textures and nuances throughout the entire body and cloak, creating high contrast
lighting.color_palette: Vivid red against neutral dark greys and blacks

detail_level: Extremely high level of detail, capturing every texture of the cloak from hood to hem, the shine of the chains, the intensity of the subject's gaze, and even individual skin pores and hair strands. Full body details including facial features, hands, and feet should be clearly visible

composition_details.shot_type: Full body shot, ensuring the entire figure from head to toe is visible and well-framed
composition_details.angle: Straight-on view, slightly elevated to capture the entire crouching figure

atmosphere: Unsettling, dangerous, and intriguing, with a sense of defiance intensified by extreme realism
cultural_reference: Ultra-realistic and dark reinterpretation of the Little Red Riding Hood fairy tale
temporal_aspect: Timeless, blending classic fairy tale elements with contemporary gothic aesthetics in an ultra-modern photographic style
negative_prompt: Bright colors (except for the red cloak), cheerful mood, forest background, wolf, grandma, picnic basket, daytime setting, any indication of excessive digital manipulation or unrealistic effects, text, icons, watermarks, logos, signatures, frame borders, date stamps, copyright symbols, cropped body parts, close-up shots that don't show the full figure
